items.description: Engraved golden bracers. Worn by the guardians of the Minor Erdtree.

items.name: Golden Prosthetic
items.description: Golden prosthetic forged using ancient techniques

items.name: Knight Gauntlets
items.description: Iron gauntlets of an unknown knight. It is made of thin iron plate. Such metal armor is heavy, but provides considerable damage negation.

items.name: Land Of Reeds Gauntlets
items.description: Gauntlets wrapped in tough leather. Worn by the warriors of the Land of Reeds

items.name: Lusat's Manchettes
items.description: Manchettes corroded by blue glintstones. Worn by Lusat, primeval current sorcerer.

items.name: Maliketh's Gauntlets
items.description: Beast's gauntlets made of black iron and decorated with gold. Worn by Maliketh the Black Blade. Maliketh, Queen Marika's loyral half-brother, bore a blade imbued with Destined Death, and there was not one demigod who did not fear him. Champions knew what was at stake. Indeed, that is what made them champions

items.name: Leyndell Soldier Gauntlets
items.description: Gauntlets worn by soldiers sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

items.name: Leather Gloves
items.description: Lightweight and battle-proven leather gloves worn by a savvy soldier. Many admire the wearer of this armor for his chivalrous and forthright spirit.

items.name: Lionel's Gauntlets
items.description: Founded iron gauntlets.

items.name: Malenia's Gauntlet
items.description: Gauntlet made of unalloyed gold. Worn by Malenia, Blade of Miquella. Malenia awaited Miquella at the foot of the husk. "My brother will keep his promise. He possesses the wisdom, the allure, of a god—he is the most fearsome Empyrean of all."

items.name: Malformed Dragon Gauntlets
items.description: Malformed golden gauntlets.

items.name: Leyndell Knight Gauntlets
items.description: Gauntlets worn by knights sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell. Time has yet to dull their luster

items.name: Omen Gauntlets
items.description: Malformed Gauntlets resembling an Omen with its horns cut off.

items.name: Mushroom Arms
items.description: Mushrooms found growing all over the body. These overgrown mushroom have colonized the arms.

items.name: Mausoleum Knight Gauntlets
items.description: Gauntlets worn by headless knights who endlessly guard the Walking Mausoleum. Time has yet to dull their luster.

items.name: Mausoleum Gauntlets
items.description: Gauntlets worn by headless soldiers who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

items.name: Millicent's Gloves
items.description: Gloves worn by Millicent the Rotting

items.name: Nox Monk Bracelets
items.description: Bracelets worn by the monks of the Eternal City. Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.

items.name: Noble's Gloves
items.description: Gloves of plush leather. Worn by expatriated royalty. A gift of such rare beauty, a royal wouldn't disgrace their illustrious heritage even if found dead, in a ditch, in the middle of nowhere, while wearing such splendid raiment.

items.name: Perfumer Gloves
items.description: Gloves of an Erdtree Capital perfumer.

items.name: Night's Cavalry Gauntlets
items.description: Pitch-black gauntlets thinly painted with dried blood. Worn by the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds.

items.name: Omenkiller Long Gloves
items.description: Long,stiff leather gloves worn by the Omenkillers.

items.name: Preceptor's Gloves
items.description: Trousers of the magic preceptors who serve the Carian royals. Black and perfectly discreet.

items.name: Raya Lucarian Gauntlets
items.description: Gauntlets worn by Raya Lucaria Academy soldiers. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

items.name: Ragged Gloves
items.description: Gauntlets pieced together from scavenged metal.

items.name: Radahn Soldier Gauntlets
items.description: Gauntlets worn by soldiers who fought by General Radahn's side. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

items.name: Radahn's Gauntlets
items.description: Gauntlets depicting the golden lion. Worn by General Radahn.

items.name: Royal Knight Gauntlets
items.description: Silver gauntlets of Loretta, a knight who served Miquella's Haligtree. Loretta, once a royal Carian knight, went on a journey in search of a haven for Albinaurics, and determined that the Haligtree was their best chance for eventual salvation.

items.name: Ronin's Gauntlets
items.description: Gauntlets of the man who calls himself Shabriri. Highly functional and heavily worn.

items.name: Redmane Knight Gauntlets
items.description: Black iron guantlets worn by knights who fought by General Radahn's side. Time has yet to dull their luster.

items.name: Queen's Bracelets
items.description: Bracelets indicating the highest order of sorcerer. Worn by Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon. When Rennala, head of both the Academy of Raya Lucaria and the Carian royal family, lost her husband Radagon, her heart went along with him. And then, those at the academy realized. That Rennala was no champion, after all.

items.name: Royal Remains Gauntlets
items.description: Gauntlets graces with gold human bones. Worn by the unspeaking adherent of Sir Gideon the All-Knowing.

items.name: Traveler's Gloves
items.description: Gloves of a traveling perfumer of no renown.

items.name: Tree Sentinel Gauntlets
items.description: Golden gauntlets of the heavy cavalry Tree Sentinels who serve the Erdtree.

items.name: Traveler's Manchettes
items.description: Light yet sturdy leather manchettes.

items.name: Sorcerer Manchettes
items.description: Manchettes worn by Raya Lucaria's magic scholars. Made by wrapping a simple cloth around the forearms.

items.name: Twinned Gauntlets
items.description: Gauntlets depicting entwined twins of gold and silver.

items.name: Traveling Maiden Gloves
items.description: Gloves worn by traveling maidens.

items.name: Vagabond Knight Gauntlets
items.description: Gauntlets of a knight banished form their motherland. Dirty and battered after enduring a lengthy vagabond journey. Metal armor is heavy, but also sturdy, offering significant damage negation.

items.name: Veteran's Gauntlets
items.description: Old gauntlets that has seen many battles. Worn by Niall, the veteran general of Sol.

items.name: Scaled Gauntlets
items.description: Gauntlets worn by Old Knight Istvan. The corroded metal is reinforced with rock-hard scales, making it high effective against non-physical attacks. Istvan is one of a few wizened Tarnished who survived to this day.

items.name: Spellblade's Gloves
items.description: Glintstone sorcerer Rogier's traveling attire, graced with an intricate, aristocratic decoration. Strengthens glintstone sorcery skills.

items.name: Vulgar Militia Gauntlets
items.description: Gauntlets worn by lean, mean, and filthy militiamen.

items.name: Warrior Gauntlets
items.description: Gauntlets of a nomadic warrior. Crafted from sturdy leather.

items.name: War Surgeon Gloves
items.description: Bloodstained white gloves of the war surgeons who were effectively mercy killers. Of the surgeons that were abducted by the Lord of Blood none were able to tame the accursed blood. None but Varré, that is; though he was an exception

items.name: Zamor Bracelets
items.description: Bracelets worn by knights of Zamor, hailed as heroes in the War against the Giants. These long-lived warriors, clad in biting, freezing winds, are said to have been the mortal enemies of the Fire Giants since time immemorial.

items.name: White Reed Gauntlets
items.description: Gauntlets of the White Reeds, fashioned from banded iron plates. Worn by the Inabam head disciples of the great swordsman Okina. The Inaba traveled in pursuit of not only the master who abandoned them, but also proper deaths, won honorably through hard-fought combat. To be a White Reed is to seek death; fitting for the Inaba, who desired nothingmore than to die by the sword.

items.name: All-knowing Greaves
items.description: Greaves set with countless eyes and ears. Worn by Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing. Knowledge begins with the recognition of one's ignorance. The realization that the search for knowledge is unending. But when Gideon glimpsed into the will of Queen Marika, he shuddered in fear. At the end that should not be.

items.name: Astrologer Trousers
items.description: Trousers worn inside a robe. Worn by those who look to the cosmos above. They read fate in the stars, and are said to be heirs of the glintstone sorcerers. But alas, the night sky no longer cradles fate.

items.name: Bandit Boots
items.description: Leather boots worn by bandits.

items.name: Battlemage Legwraps
items.description: Legwraps worn by the scholars of the Raya Lucaria Academy, tattered from being worn on the battlefield.

items.name: Alberich's Trousers
items.description: Mad Tongue Alberich's trousers.

items.name: Aristocrat Boots
items.description: Boots made from tanned leather. Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital. Abandoning their birthplace after the shattering, these undead wanderers are the pitiful product of unending life.

items.name: Banished Knight Greaves
items.description: Thick, full set of armor covering the entire body. These greaves were worn by knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes. These fierce warriors were each and all accomplished. Perhaps that is why, despite their territorial losses, they were still named knights.

items.name: Blackflame Monk Greave
items.description: Black iron greaves featuring a flame motif.

items.name: Beast Champion Greaves
items.description: Silver greaves engraved with tiny beasts. Worn by Bernahl the Recusant.

items.name: Black Knife Greaves
items.description: Greaves used by the Black Knife Assassins. Crafted with scale armor that makes no sound. The assassins that carried out the deeds of the Night of the Black Knives were all women, and rumored to be Numen who had close ties with Marika herself.

items.name: Blaidd's Greaves
items.description: Well-worn black greaves of the man-wolf Blaidd.

items.name: Cleanrot Greaves
items.description: Greaves of the Cleanrot Knights, celebrated for their undefeated campaign in the Shattering.

items.name: Blue Silver Mail Skirt
items.description: Chainmail skirt crafted with blue silver. Worn by the wolf-riding Albinauric archers.

items.name: Briar Greaves
items.description: Battered iron greaves from a foreign land. Worn by Elemer of the Briar.

items.name: Brave's Legwraps
items.description: Greaves wrapped in thick leather. Garb worn by warriors of the frigid uplands. Has a fur lining which excels at keeping the cold at bay.

items.name: Commoner's Shoes
items.description: Modest shoes made of cloth. Standard wear for commoners of the Lands Between. Only, there are no commoners remaining with their wits about them.

items.name: Carian Knight Greaves
items.description: Greaves of the enchanted knights that once served the Carian royal family. The enchanted knights, anointed by the Lunar Queen, were all decorated heroes, were heroes of the highest honors, but fell into disarray with the decline of the royal family.

items.name: Cloth Trousers
items.description: Trousers made of coarse material, commonly worn in the Lands Between.

items.name: Chain Leggings
items.description: Leggings made of woven chain. Standard issue for ordinary soldiers. Though plain in appearance, they offer dependable protection.

items.name: Bloodhound Knight Greaves
items.description: Metal greaves of the Bloodhound Knights. The Bloodhound Knights are trained as hunters and known to be unshakable trackers. Without the use of language, each knight chooses his own master. Once the decision has been made the knight stays loyal for life.

items.name: Bull-goat Greaves
items.description: Great Horned Tragoth's greaves. Covers its wearer with a pair of giant horns, providing staunch poise.

items.name: Cuckoo Knight Greaves
items.description: Greaves worn by Raya Lucaria Academy knights. Time has yet to dull their luster.

items.name: Crucible Greaves
items.description: Greaves of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. Hold the power of the crucible of life, the primordial form of the Erdtree. Strengthen Aspects of the Crucible incantations. In time, the strength shown by these knights, and even their appearance, was seen as chaotic and deserving of scorn.

items.name: Confessor Boots
items.description: Leather boots of the church confessors. The churches outside the Lands Between, dedicated to the teachings of the Two Fingers, send confessors out to follow the guidance of grace. The confessors are loyal servants to the Two Fingers, ready to hunt down and quietly dispose of their enemies.

items.name: Drake Knight Greaves
items.description: Greaves wrapped in thick leather. Garb worn by warriors of the frigid uplands. Has a fur lining which excels at keeping the cold at bay.

items.name: Consort's Trousers
items.description: Fine white trousers, perfectly suited for wearing beneath a silk robe.

items.name: Deathbed Smalls
items.description: Skirt worn by Phia, the Deathbed Companion.

items.name: Eccentric's Breeches
items.description: The knight Jerren's breeches. Jerren preferred a nomadic existence, but after spending time as a guest of the Carian royals, he became the guest commander for General Radahn. And for the first time, the restless tumbleweed would be bound by honorable oath.

items.name: Duelist Greaves
items.description: Greaves encircles by bronze snakes. Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum. The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes. The snake is viewed as a traitor to the Erdtree, and the audience delighted in seeing these bronze effigies beaten and battered.

items.name: Elden Lord Greaves
items.description: Greaves of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. The age of the Erdtree began amongst conflict, when Godfrey was lord of the battlefield. He led the War against the Giants. Faced the Storm Lord, alone. And then, there came a moment. When his last worthy enemy fell. And it was then, as the story is told, that the hue of Lord Godfrey's eyes faded.

items.name: Depraved Perfumer Trousers
items.description: Trousers worn by depraved perfumers.

items.name: Errant Sorcerer Boots
items.description: Commonplace leather boots, sturdy enough to withstand a long journey.

items.name: Fire Prelate Greaves
items.description: Black iron greaves with the appearance of flames. Attire of the Fire Prelates, commanders of the Fire Monks.

items.name: Fur Leggings
items.description: Leggings fashioned from bristly pelts. Worn by ancestral follower warriors. The ancestral followers keep their distance from the Erdtree, awaiting new buds. They are certain to sprout from their very flesh, and indeed, their souls.

items.name: Fingerprint Greaves
items.description: Iron greaves singed and blistered by fingers. Worn by Vyke, knight of the Roundtable Hold. No other Tarnished was closer to the throne of the Elden Lord than Vyke. But without announcement, Vyke traveled far below the capital, and was scorched by the flame of frenzy. Did he make his choice for his maiden, or did some other force lure him with suggestion?

items.name: Finger Maiden Shoes
items.description: Shoes worn by maidens who serve the Two Fingers. The maidens live to serve a chosen Tarnished, sharing their guidance and the wisdom of the Two Fingers. The guidance of grace would ensure that the pair be brought together. Or at least, such was the promise long ago.

items.name: Exile Greaves
items.description: Damaged iron greaves. Worn by soldiers sent to the penal colonies.

items.name: Foot Soldier Greaves
items.description: Metal Graves that have already been mended countless times. Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.

items.name: Gelmir Knight Greaves
items.description: Greaves worn by knights once loyal to Praetor Rykard. Time has yet to dull their luster.

items.name: Godrick Knight Greaves
items.description: Greaves worn by knights loyal to Godrick the Grafted. Time has yet to dull their luster.

items.name: Fire Monk Greaves
items.description: Black iron greaves featuring a flame motif. Attire of the Fire Monks.

items.name: Godrick Soldier Greaves
items.description: Greaves worn by soldiers loyal to Godrick the Grafted. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

items.name: Gold Waistwrap
items.description: Waistwrap made in the image of Erdtree branches. A minimal adornment made by Lord Goldmask's disciples. Those disciples have long since left him.

items.name: Haligtree Knight Greaves
items.description: Greaves worn by knights sworn to the Haligtree. Time has yet to dull their luster.

items.name: Godskin Apostle Trousers
items.description: Trousers made by seweing together patches of smooth skin.

items.name: Hoslow's Greaves
items.description: Garish silver greaves decorated with red embellishments. Passed down through the Hoslow family.

items.name: Haligtree Greaves
items.description: Greaves worn by soldiers sworn to the Haligtree. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

items.name: Godskin Noble Trousers
items.description: Trousers made by sewing together patches of smooth skin. Subcutaneous fat makes them plump and soft. Worn by Godskin Nobles. Nobles are the most ancient apostles who are said to have assimilated inhuman physiology. Not unlike the crucible, the Erdtree in its primordial form.

items.name: Guardian Greaves
items.description: Engraved golden greaves. Worn by the guardians of the Minor Erdtrees.

items.name: Kaiden Trousers
items.description: Trousers worn by Kaiden sellswords.

items.name: Knight Greaves
items.description: Iron greaves of an unknown knight. It is made of thin iron plate. Such metal armor is heavy, but provides considerable damage negation.

items.name: Land Of Reeds Greaves
items.description: Greaves wrapped in tough leather.

items.name: Leather Boots
items.description: Lightweight and battle-proven leather boots worn by a savvy soldier. Many admire the wearer of this armor for his chivalrous and forthright spirit.

items.name: Leather Trousers
items.description: Well-made leather trousers. The lower legs are each bound in cord for ease of movement.

items.name: Leyndell Knight Greaves
items.description: Greaves worn by knights sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell. Time has yet to dull their luster.

items.name: Leyndell Soldier Greaves
items.description: Greaves worn by soldiers sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

items.name: Lionel's Greaves
items.description: Rounded iron greaves. Worn by Lionel the Lionhearted.

items.name: Malformed Dragon Greaves
items.description: Malformed golden greaves.

items.name: Malenia's Greaves
items.description: Greaves made of unalloyed gold. Worn by Malenia, Blade of Miquella. Malenia awaited Miquella at the foot of the husk. "My brother will keep his promise. He possesses the wisdom, the allure, of a god—he is the most fearsome Empyrean of all."

items.name: Maliketh's Greaves
items.description: Beast's greaves made of black iron and decorated with gold. Worn by Maliketh the Black Blade. Maliketh, Queen Marika's loyal half-brother, bore a blade imbued with Destined Death, and there was not one demigod who did not fear him. Champions knew what was at stake. Indeed, that is what made them champions.

items.name: Mausoleum Greaves
items.description: Greaves worn by headless soldiers who endlessly guard the Wandering Museum. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

items.name: Mausoleum Knight Greaves
items.description: Greaves worn by headless knights who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum. Time has yet to dull their luster.

items.name: Old Sorcerer Legwraps
items.description: Ragged waistcloth that extends to the thighs. Common amongst old-fashioned sorcerers.

items.name: Nox Monk Greaves
items.description: Greaves worn by the monks of the Eternal City. Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.

items.name: Omenkiller Boots
items.description: Long, stiff leather gloves worn by the Omenkillers.

items.name: Nomadic Merchant's Trousers
items.description: Trousers of the nomadic merchants. These merchants once thrived as the Great Caravan, but after being accused of heretical beliefs, their entire clan was rounded up and buried alive far underground. Then, they chanted a curse of despair, and summoned the flame of frenzy.

items.name: Page Trousers
items.description: Trousers worn by pages who serve nobility and are mindful to keep them out of harm's way.

items.name: Night's Cavalry Greaves
items.description: Pitch-black greaves thinly painted with dried blood. Worn by the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds.

items.name: Mushroom Legs
items.description: Mushrooms found growing all over the body. These overgrown mushroom have colonized the Legs.  To those enraptured by the scarlet rot, they are holy vestments that root one to the earth.

items.name: Omen Greaves
items.description: Malformed greaves resembling an Omen with its horns cut off.

items.name: Old Aristocrat Shoes
items.description: Hard-wearing shoes made of leather. Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital. Garb favored by the aged.

items.name: Noble's Trousers
items.description: White trousers of superior craftsmanship. Worn by expatriated royalty. A gift of such rare beauty, a royal wouldn't disgrace their illustrious heritage even if found dead, in a ditch, in the middle of nowhere, while wearing such splendid raiment.

items.name: Ragged Loincloth
items.description: Greaves pieced together from scavenged metal.

items.name: Perfumer Sarong
items.description: Sarong of an Erdtree Capital perfumer.

items.name: Preceptor's Trousers
items.description: Trousers of the magic preceptors who serve the Carian royals. Black and perfectly discreet.

items.name: Prophet Trousers
items.description: Trousers of the exiled prophets who foresaw that their faith would end in flames — and were persecuted and driven from their homes as a result. Its fabric scrapes against their skin like a file, and the rickety cart wheel around the neck warns passers-by not to lend an ear to their meandering sermons.

items.name: Queen's Leggings
items.description: Leggings indicating the highest order of sorcerer. Worn by Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon. When Rennala, head of both the Academy of Raya Lucaria and the Carian royal family, lost her husband Radagon, her heart went along with him. And then, those at the academy realized. That Rennala was no champion, after all.

items.name: Raya Lucarian Greaves
items.description: Greaves worn by Raya Lucaria Academy soldiers. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

items.name: Prisoner Trousers
items.description: Tattered trousers. Worn by a prisoner convicted of an appalling crime. Never once washed, every fiber is filthy. The smell is beyond belief.

items.name: Redmane Knight Greaves
items.description: Black iron greaves worn by knights who fought by General Radahn's side. Time has yet to dull their luster.

items.name: Radahn's Greaves
items.description: Greaves depicting the golden lion. Worn by General Radahn.

items.name: Radahn Soldier Greaves
items.description: Greaves worn by soldiers who fought by General Radahn's side. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.

items.name: Royal Knight Greaves
items.description: Silver greaves of Loretta, a knight who served Miquella's Haligtree. Loretta, once a royal Carian knight, went on a journey in search of a haven for Albinaurics, and determined that the Haligtree was their best chance for eventual salvation.

items.name: Ronin's Greaves
items.description: Greaves of the man who calls himself Shabriri. Highly functional and heavily worn.

items.name: Royal Remains Greaves
items.description: Greaves graced with gold human bones. Worn by the unspeaking adherent of Sir Gideon the All-Knowing.

items.name: Sage Trousers
items.description: Thick burgundy trousers. Attire of the wise sages who were deemed heretical. Evidence that the wearer was driven from town.

items.name: Shaman Leggings
items.description: Leggings fashioned from bristly pelts. Worn by ancestral follower shamans.

items.name: Snow Witch Skirt
items.description: Witch's skirt in the color of snow. Once worn by the snowy crone who the young Ranni encountered deep in the woods. She was a witch, and well versed in cold sorceries. It is said that the doll that houses Ranni's soul was modeled after her. That old witch was Ranni's secret mentor.

items.name: Scaled Greaves
items.description: Gauntlets worn by Old Knight Istvan. The corroded metal is reinforced with rock-hard scales, making it high effective against non-physical attacks. Istvan is one of a few wizened Tarnished who survived to this day.

items.name: Rotten Duelist Greaves
items.description: Greaves wrapped with bronze snakes, eaten through by scarlet rot. Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum. The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes.

items.name: Spellblade's Trousers
items.description: Glintstone sorcerer Rogier's traveling attire, graced with an intricate, aristocratic decoration. Strengthens glintstone sorcery skills.

items.name: Sorcerer Leggings
items.description: Leggings worn by Raya Lucaria's magic scholars. Made by wrapping a simple cloth around the legs.

items.name: Traveler's Slops
items.description: Slops of a traveling perfumer of no renown.

items.name: Veteran's Greaves
items.description: An old greaves that has seen many battles.Worn by Niall, the great veteran general of Sol.

items.name: Traveler's Boots
items.description: Light yet sturdy leather boots.

items.name: Traveling Maiden Boots
items.description: Boots worn by traveling maidens.

items.name: Twinned Greaves
items.description: Greaves depicting entwined twins of gold and silver.

items.name: Tree Sentinel Greaves
items.description: Golden greaves of the heavy cavalry Tree Sentinels who serve the Erdtree.

items.name: War Surgeon Trousers
items.description: Bloodstained trousers of the war surgeons who were effectively mercy killers. Of the surgeons that were abducted by the Lord of Blood none were able to tame the accursed blood. None but Varré, that is; though he was an exception

items.name: Vulgar Militia Greaves
items.description: Greaves worn by lean, mean, and filthy militiamen.

items.name: Warrior Greaves
items.description: Greaves of a nomadic warrior. Crafted from sturdy leather.

items.name: Vagabond Knight Greaves
items.description: Greaves of a knight banished from their motherland. Dirty and battered after enduring a lengthy vagabond journey.

items.name: White Reed Greaves
items.description: Greaves of the White Reeds, fashioned from banded iron plates. Worn by the Inabam head disciples of the great swordsman Okina. The Inaba traveled in pursuit of not only the master who abandoned them, but also proper deaths, won honorably through hard-fought combat. To be a White Reed is to seek death; fitting for the Inaba, who desired nothingmore than to die by the sword.

items.name: Zamor Legwraps
items.description: Legwraps worn by knights of Zamor, hailed as heroes in the War against the Giants. These long-lived warriors, clad in biting, freezing winds, are said to have been the mortal enemies of the Fire Giants since time immemorial.

items.name: Ash Of War: Prelate's Charge
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Flame affinity and the following skill:"Prelate's Charge: Slam armament into the ground to create a surge of flames, then charge in. Hold to continue the charge."Usable on large and colossal axes and hammers.

items.name: Ash Of War: Barrage
items.description: This Ash of War grants no affinity to an armament, but imparts the following skill:"Barrage: Archery skill using a bow held horizontally. Ready the bow, then fire off a rapid succession of shots faster than the eye can see."Usable on light bows.

items.name: Ash Of War: Barbaric Roar
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Heavy affinity and the following skill:"Barbaric Roar: Let loose a bestial roar to rally the spirit and increase attack power. While active, strong attacks change to savage combo attacks."Usable on melee armaments (daggers, thrusting swords, and whips excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Blood Blade
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Blood affinity and the following skill:"Blood Blade: Wound self to coat the armament with blood, then unleash an airborne blood blade that causes hemorrhaging. Can be fired in rapid succession."Usable on small and medium swords.

items.name: Ash Of War: Assassin's Gambit
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Occult affinity and the following skill:"Assassin's Gambit: Skill that masks the user's presence at the cost of a self-inflicted wound. Grants near-invisibility and silences footsteps."Usable on small and medium straight swords and thrusting swords.

items.name: Ash Of War: Black Flame Tornado
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Flame affinity and the following skill:"Black Flame Tornado: Spin armament overhead and then punge it into the ground to summon a raging vortex of black flames. Hold to create an initial flame tornado while spinning the armament."Usable on polearms and twinblades.

items.name: Ash Of War: Barricade Shield
items.description: This Ash of War grants no affinity to an armament, but imparts the following skill:"Barricade Shield: Skill made famous by Sir Neidhardt. Focus your energy into the shield, temporarily hardening it to deflect greater blows."Usable on all shields.

items.name: Ash Of War: Beast's Roar
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following skill:"Beast's Roar: Unleash a beastly roar, rending the air as a forward-travelling projectile."Usable on all melee armaments.

items.name: Ash Of War: Bloodhound's Step
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following skill:"Bloodhound's Step: Skill that allows the user to become temporarily invisible while dodging at high speed. Moves faster and travels farther than a regular quickstep. This skill can be used to circle around lock-on targets."Usable on all melee armaments.

items.name: Ash Of War: Braggart's Roar
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Heavy affinity and the following skill:"Braggart's Roar: Declare your presence with a boastful roar. Raises attack power, defense, and stamina recovery speed."Usable on melee armaments (daggers, thrusting swords, and whips excepted ).

items.name: Ash Of War: Bloody Slash
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Blood affinity and the following skill:"Bloody Slash: Bloody Oath skill granted by the Lord of Blood. From a low stance, coat the blade in your own blood to unleash a rending blood slash in a wide arc."Usable on swords (colossal weapons excepted)

items.name: Ash Of War: Carian Greatsword
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Magic affinity and the following skill:"Carian Greatsword: Carian royal prestige embodied in a skill. Transform blade into a magical greatsword and swing it down. Can be charged to increase its power."Usable on swords (colossal weapons excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Carian Grandeur
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Magic affinity and the following skill:"Carian Grandeur: Carian royal prestige embodied in a skill. Transform blade into a magical greatsword and swing it down. Can be charged to increase its power by up to two levels."Usable on swords (colossal weapons excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Carian Retaliation
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Magic affinity and the following skill:"Carian Retaliation: Swing the shield to dispel incoming sorceries and incantations, transforming the magic into retaliatory glintblades. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry."Usable on small and medium shields.

items.name: Ash Of War: Blood Tax
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Blood affinity and the following skill:"Blood Tax: Blood Oath skill granted by the Lord of Blood. Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts that rob the target of both their blood and their HP."Usable on armaments capable of thrusting(colossal weapons excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Charge Forth
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Quality affinity and the following skill:"Charge Forth: Quickly charge forward with the armament at the hip, carrying the momentum into a thrust. Hold to cover a greater distance."Usable on polearms capable of thrusting, heavy thrusting swords, and twinblades.

items.name: Ash Of War: Chilling Mist
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Cold affinity and the following skill:"Chilling Mist: Coat armament in frost, and then slash, spreading frigid mist forwards. The armament retains its frost for a while."Usable on melee armaments (whips, fists, and claws excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Cragblade
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Heavy affinity and the following skill:"Cragblade: Skill that manipulates gravity. Bury the armament in the ground, pulling rocks from the earth to reinforce it. Increases attack power and makes it easier to break enemy stance."Usable on melee armaments (whips excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Double Slash
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following skill:"Double Slash:Skill of superior swordsmen. Perform a crossing slash attack from a low stance. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks."Usable on swords and polearms capable of slashing (colossal weapons excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Determination
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Quality affinity and the following skill:"Determination: A knightly skill. Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, powering up your next attack."Usable on all melee armaments.

items.name: Ash Of War: Earthshaker
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Heavy affinity and the following skill:"Earthshaker: Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash an earth-shaking shockwave. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike."Usable on greataxes, warhammers, and colossal weapons.

items.name: Ash Of War: Enchanted Shot
items.description: This ash of war grants no affinity to an armament, but imparts the following skill:"Enchanted Shot: Archery skill that enlivens the arrow with spiritual essence. The resulting shot will fly faster than regular shots and change its trajectory to follow the target."Usable on light bows and longbows.

items.name: Ash Of War: Endure
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Heavy affinity and the following skill:"Endure: Assume an anchored stance to brace for incoming attacks, briefly boosting poise. Damage taken while using this skill is reduced."Usable on all melee armaments.

items.name: Ash Of War: Eruption
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Fire affinity and the following skill:"Eruption: Skill of the knights who serve at Volcano Manor. Slam armament into the ground, spawning roiling lava which spouts up upon release."Usable on large and colossal swords, axes, and hammers.

items.name: Ash Of War: Flame Of The Redmanes
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Fire affinity and the following skill:"Flame of the Redmanes: Skill of the Redmanes, who fought alongside General Radahn. Produce a powerful burst of flames in a wide frontward arc."Usable on all melee armaments.

items.name: Ash Of War: Flaming Strike
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Fire affinity and the following skill:"Flaming Strike: Skill that emits flame in a wide frontward arc. Follow up with a strong attack to perform a lunging, sweeping strike. This will also coat the armament in fire."Usable on melee armaments (colossal weapons and whips excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Golden Land
items.description: Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash a blast of sacred energy that coalesces into golden darts. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike

items.name: Ash Of War: Glintblade Phalanx
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Magic affinity and the following skill:"Glintblade Phalanx: Skill used by the enchanted knights who served the Carian royal family. Form an arch of magic glintblades overhead, which will attack Foes automatically. Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust."Usable on swords as well as polearms capable of thrusting (colossal weapons excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Glintstone Pebble
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Magic affinity and the following skill:"Glintstone Pebble: Skill that employs the glintstone sorcery of the same name. Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust, performed while the armament is still imbued with glintstone."Usable on swords as well as polearms capable of thrusting (colossal weapons excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Giant Hunt
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Quality affinity and the following skill:"Giant Hunt: Skill developed for confronting gigantic foes. Step forward from a low stance, carrying the momentum into a sudden upward thrust."Usable on large and colossal weapons capable of thrusting, spears and twinblades.

items.name: Ash Of War: Golden Parry
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Sacred affinity and the following skill:"Golden Parry: Perform an Erdtree incantation and swing the shield to deflect enemy attacks and break their stance. Effective even at a slight distance."Usable on small and medium shields.

items.name: Ash Of War: Golden Slam
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Sacred affinity and the following skill:"Golden Slam: Skill of the avatars who protect Minor Erdtrees. Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends golden shockwaves in all directions."Usable on all melee armaments.

items.name: Ash Of War: Golden Vow
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Sacred affinity and the following skill:"Golden Vow: Skill passed down from antiquity among the knights of the capital. Raise armament aloft and pledge to honor the Erdtree in battle, granting self and nearby allies increased attack power and defense."Usable on all melee armaments.

items.name: Ash Of War: Gravitas
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Magic affinity and the following Skill:Gravitas A Skill from a great white king with stone skin.Pierce the ground with your armament to damage foes as a surge of gravity draws them in.It can be used on melee armaments that are not small.

items.name: Ash Of War: Ground Slam
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Heavy affinity and the following skill:"Ground Slam: Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends a powerful shockwave in all directions."Usable on all melee armaments.

items.name: Ash Of War: Hoarah Loux's Earthshaker
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Heavy and the following skill:"Hoarah Loux's Earthshaker: Slam both hands onto the ground to violently shake the earth and unleash a shockwave. Follow up with an additional input to slam the ground again."Usable on all melee armaments.

items.name: Ash Of War: Holy Ground
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Sacred affinity and the following skill:"Holy Ground: Raise shield to create an Erdtree-consecrated area that continuously restores HP and boosts defense for self and allies inside it."Usable on all shields.

items.name: Ash Of War: Hoarfrost Stomp
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Cold affinity and the following skill:"Hoarfrost Stomp: Stomp hard to spread a trail of freezing mist on the ground. The mist applies the frost status effect."Usable on all melee armaments.

items.name: Ash Of War: Ice Spear
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Cold affinity and the following skill:"Ice Spear: Skill of the warriors who served Lunar Princess Ranni. Spin armament to release cold magic, then channel it into a piercing spear of ice."

items.name: Ash Of War: Impaling Thrust
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following skill:"Impaling Thrust: Skill that lets piercing armaments overcome enemy shields. Build power, then lunge forward for a strong thrust that pierces an enemy's guard."Usable on armaments capable of thrusting (colossal weapons excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Kick
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Heavy affinity and the following skill:"Kick: Push an enemy back with a high kick. Effective against enemies who are guarding, and can break a foe's stance. Sometimes a simple tool is the most effective."Usable on all melee armaments.

items.name: Ash Of War: Lightning Ram
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Lightning affinity and the following skill:"Lightning Ram: Skill inspired by tumbling rams. Let out a bleat, then tumble forwards, clad in lightning. Tumbles can be repeated in rapid succession."Usable on all melee armaments.

items.name: Ash Of War: Lightning Slash
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Lightning affinity and the following skill:"Lightning Slash: Call down a bolt of lightning into armament, then swing it down to create an explosive shock. The armament retains the lightning enchantment for a while."Usable on swords, axes, and hammers.

items.name: Ash Of War: Lifesteal Fist
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Occult affinity and the following skill:"Lifesteal Fist: Skill that demonstrates mastery of the art of controlling vital energies.A slow, controlled punch with an energy-infused fist that renders foes unconscious and steals their HP. Only effective against foes of human build."Usable on fists and claws.

items.name: Ash Of War: Lion's Claw
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Heavy affinity and the following skill:"Lion's Claw: Skill of the Redmanes, who fought alongside General Radahn. Somersault forwards, striking foes with armament."Usable on swords, axes, and hammers (small armaments and thrusting swords excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Loretta's Slash
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Magic affinity and the following skill:"Loretta's Slash: Skill of Loretta the Royal Knight. Leap forward, imbuing the blade with glintstone, then descend, accelerating into a sweeping slash."Usable on polearms and twinblades.

items.name: Ash Of War: Mighty Shot
items.description: This Ash of War grants no affinity to an armament, but imparts the following skill:"Mighty Shot: Archery skill performed from an oblique stance. Ready the bow, then pull the bowstring to its limit to enhance the power of the shot, penetrating the enemy's guard."Usable on light bows and longbows.

items.name: Ash Of War: No Skill
items.description: This Ash of War grants no affinity to an armament and replaces any skill present with the following:"No skill: This armament has no skill. If the armament in the other hand has a skill, that skill will be used instead."Usable on shields and torches.

items.name: Ash Of War: Piercing Fang
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following skill:"Piercing Fang: Skill used by Yura, the Bloody Finger Hunter. Starting with the blade held horizontally, make a powerful thrust that cannot be blocked."Usable on medium and large armaments capable of thrusting.

items.name: Ash Of War: Parry
items.description: This Ash of War grants no affinity to an armament, but imparts the following skill:"Parry: Use this skill in time with a foe's melee attack to deflect it and break that foe's stance. This provides an opening to perform a critical hit."Usable on daggers, curved swords, thrusting swords, fists, claws, and small and medium shields.

items.name: Ash Of War: Poisonous Mist
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Poison affinity and the following skill:"Poisonous Mist: Bathe armament in poison, and then slash, spreading toxic mist forwards. The armament retains its poison for a while."Usable on melee armaments (whips, fists, and claws excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Prayerful Strike
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Sacred affinity and the following skill:"Prayerful Strike: Raise armament aloft in prayer, then slam it into the ground. This inspired blow restores HP to the self and nearby allies if it successfully hits."Usable on axes and hammers.

items.name: Ash Of War: Phantom Slash
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Quality affinity and the following skill:"Phantom Slash: Skill inspired by the fond remembrances of the Night's Cavalry. Creates an apparition of the knights' former instructor who guides a joint lunging upward swing. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack."Usable on polearms and twinblades (great spears excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Poison Moth Flight
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Poison affinity and thefollowing skill:"Poison Moth Flight: Slash with a poison-infused blade. If thefollow-up strike lands on a poisoned foe, it will deal significantdamage."Usable on small and medium swords (twinblades excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Quickstep
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following skill:"Quickstep: Skill prized by the crafty and fleet of foot.Perform a quickstep maneuver that allows for circling around lock-on targets."Usable on all melee armaments.

items.name: Ash Of War: Raptor Of The Mists
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following skill:"Raptor of the Mists: Duck into a low stance, momentarily vanishing. If an enemy attack connects, avian wings will allow for a quick escape into the air."Usable on all melee armaments.

items.name: Ash Of War: Rain Of Arrows
items.description: This Ash of War grants no affinity to an armament, but imparts the following skill:"Rain of Arrows: Archery skill performed from a low stance. Ready the bow, then fire a burst of arrows into the sky to shower the enemy with projectiles."Usable on all bows.

items.name: Ash Of War: Repeating Thrust
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following Skill:Repeating Thrust Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts.This Skill takes some time to build up, but it is very powerful.It can be used on all thrusting armaments.

items.name: Ash Of War: Royal Knight's Resolve
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Quality affinity and the following skill:"Royal Knight's Resolve: Skill of the knights who once served the Elden Lord. Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, greatly powering up your next attack."Usable on all melee armaments.

items.name: Ash Of War: Sacred Ring Of Light
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Sacred affinity and the following skill:"Sacred Ring of Light: Skill used by the commanders of the Cleanrot Knights. Gather a sacred ring of light in the armament, and then fire it forwards. Can be fired in rapid succession."Usable on polearms (great spears excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Sacred Blade
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Sacred affinity and the following skill:"Sacred Blade: Grants armament's attacks holy essence and fires off a golden blade projectile. The armament retains its holy essence for awhile."Usable on all melee armaments (whips, fists, and claws excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Sacred Order
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Sacred affinity and the following skill:"Sacred Order: Skill of the Golden Order fundamentalist knights. Perform a salute and grant the armament holy essence. Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death."Usable on all melee armaments.

items.name: Ash Of War: Seppuku
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Blood and the following skill:"Seppuku: A forbidden technique used by swordsmen from the Land of Reeds. Plunge the blade into your stomach to stain it with blood. Increases attack power and improves ability to inflict blood loss."Usable on swords as well as polearms capable of thrusting (small and colossal weapons excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Spinning Strikes
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Quality affinity and the following skill:"Spinning Strikes: Polearm skill that performs continuous spinning attacks. Hold to continue the attack. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack. Nullifies projectiles such as arrows while spinning."Usable on polearms (great spears excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Shield Crash
items.description: This Ash of War grants no affinity to an armament, but imparts the following skill:"Shield Crash: Two-hand the shield and charge forwards while maintaining guard. Weaker enemies will be shoved backwards and can even be staggered. Hold to extend the duration of the charge forwards."Usable on all shields.

items.name: Ash Of War: Spinning Slash
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following skill:"Spinning Slash: Skill favored by dexterous warriors. Slash foes as your body spins. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack."Usable on swords, axes, and polearms (colossal weapons excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Spectral Lance
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Occult affinity and the following skill:"Spectral Lance: Skill of the headless Mausoleum Knights. Hurl a phantasmic spear at foes."Usable on polearms (reapers excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Spinning Weapon
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Magic affinity and the following skill:"Spinning Weapon: Defensive skill employed by Carian princesses. Lifts armament into mid-air, then makes it spin violently. Those it touches will suffer successive attacks."Usable on small and medium swords, axes, and hammers, as well as polearms and staves (great spears excepted)

items.name: Ash Of War: Square Off
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Quality affinity and the following skill:"Square Off: This skill starts with the sword held level. Follow up with a normal attack to slash upwards through enemy's guard, or a strong attack to perform a running thrust"Usable on straight swords.

items.name: Ash Of War: Shield Bash
items.description: This Ash of War grants no affinity to an armament, but imparts the following skill:"Shield Bash: Brace behind shield before using bodyweight to ram foes while maintaining guarding stance. Weaker enemies will be shoved backwards, and can even be staggered."Usable on all shields.

items.name: Ash Of War: Stamp (sweep)
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Heavy affinity and the following skill:"Stamp (Sweep): Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks. Follow up with a strong attack for a sweeping strike"Usable on swords, axes, and hammers (small and medium swords excepted)

items.name: Ash Of War: Stamp (upward Cut)
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Heavy affinity and the following skill:"Stamp (Upward Cut): Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks. Follow up with a strong attack for an upward strike."Usable on swords, axes, and hammers, (small and medium swords excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Stormcaller
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Quality affinity and the following skill:"Stormcaller: One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Spin armament to create surrounding storm winds. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks."Usable on swords capable of slashing, axes, hammers, and polearms (small and colossal weapons excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Storm Stomp
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Quality affinity and the following skill:"Storm Stomp: One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Stomp hard on the ground to kick up a momentary storm."Usable on all melee armaments.

items.name: Ash Of War: Storm Wall
items.description: This Ash of War grants no affinity to an armament, but imparts the following skill:"Storm Wall: Swing the shield to create a wall of storm winds in front of you, deflecting arrows and other such physical projectiles. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry."Usable on small and medium shields.

items.name: Ash Of War: Storm Assault
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Quality affinity and the following skill:"Storm Assault: One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Leap forward through surrounding storm winds and thrust armament downward. The attack will produce more storm winds at the point of impact."Usable on polearms capable of thrusting, heavy thrusting swords, and twinblades.

items.name: Ash Of War: Thops's Barrier
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Magic affinity and the following skill:"Thops's Barrier: Erect a magical forcefield while swinging the shield to deflect sorceries and incantations. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry."Usable on small and medium shields.

items.name: Ash Of War: Storm Blade
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Quality affinity and the following skill:"Storm Blade: Lost skill of Stormveil. Surround armament with shearing storm winds that can be fired forward. Can be fired in rapid succession."Usable on swords (colossal weapons and twinblades excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Sword Dance
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following skill:"Sword Dance: Quickly close in to perform a series of spinning upward slashes. Follow up with an additional input to finish with a downward slash."Usable on swords, axes, and polearms capable of slashing (colossal weapons and great spears excepted).

items.name: Through And Through
items.description: This Ash of War grants no affinity to an armament, but imparts the following skill:"Through and Through: Powerful archery skill using a greatbow held in an oblique stance. Ready the greatbow, then twist the bowstring to fire a mighty greatarrow that can penetrate through enemies."Usable on greatbows.

items.name: Ash Of War: Thunderbolt
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Lightning affinity and the following skill:"Thunderbolt: Skill used by the capital's ancient dragon cult. Raise armament aloft to call down a bolt of lightning. Can be fired in rapid succession."Usable on all melee armaments.

items.name: Ash Of War: Unsheathe
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Keen affinity and the following skill:"Unsheathe: Skill of swordsmen from the Land of Reeds. Sheathe blade, holding it at the hip in a composed stance. Follow up with a normal or strong attack to perform a swift slash attack."Usable on katana.

items.name: Ash Of War: Vacuum Slice
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Quality affinity and the following skill:"Vacuum Slice: Lost skill of ancient heroes. Hold the armament aloft to surround it with a shearing vacuum, then launch it forwards as a blade-like projectile."Usable on swords and axes (small and colossal axes excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Troll's Roar
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Heavy affinity and the following skill:"Troll's Roar: Look into the distance and let out an intense roar, generating a powerful shockwave that blows back surrounding foes. Follow up with a strong attack to slam the armament down."Usable on large and colossal swords, axes, and hammers.

items.name: Ash Of War: War Cry
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Heavy affinity and the following skill:"War Cry: Give a war cry to rally the spirit and increase attack power. While active, strong attacks change to charging attacks."Usable on melee armaments (daggers, thrusting swords, and whips excepted).

items.name: Ash Of War: Vow Of The Indomitable
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Sacred affinity and the following skill:"Vow of the Indomitable: Skill of the ancient warriors of the Erdtree. Hold shield aloft to imbue yourself with golden power, granting momentary invincibility."Usable on all shields.

items.name: Ash Of War: Waves Of Darkness
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Magic affinity and the following skill:"Waves of Darkness: Plunge armament into the ground to release three waves of darkness. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike."Usable on greataxes, warhammers, and colossal weapons.

items.name: Ash Of War: White Shadow's Lure
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Occult affinity and the following skill:"White Shadow's Lure: Hold armament in a brief, silent prayer to create a white shadow. The apparition lures in foes of human build who are not in combat, drawing their aggression. Effective on demi-humans even if they are already in a combat state."Usable on all melee armaments.

items.name: Ash Of War: Wild Strikes
items.description: This Ash of War grants an armament the Heavy affinity and the following skill:"Wild strikes: Swing armaments with wild abandon. Hold to continue swinging. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack."Usable on axes and hammers as well as curved swords and greatswords (colossal weapons excepted).

items.name: Lost Ashes Of War
items.description: Empty ashes of war, devoid of any memories of battle.Unable to apply any kind of affinity in their current state, but can be used by Smithing Master Hewg of the Roundtable Hold to recreate other ashes.Thus does the copy pass into becoming the genuine article.

items.name: Hero
items.description: A stalwart Hero, at home with a battleaxe, descended from a badlands chieftain

items.name: Warrior
items.description: A twinblade wielding warrior from a nomadic tribe. An origin of exceptional technique

items.name: Astrologer
items.description: A scholar who reads fate in the stars. Heir to the school of glintstone sorcery

items.name: Bandit
items.description: A dangerous bandit who strikes for weak points. Excels at ranged combat with bows

items.name: Prisoner
items.description: A prisoner bound in an iron mask. Studied in glintstone sorcery, having lived among the elite prior to sentencing.

items.name: Vagabond
items.description: A knight exiled from their homeland to wander. A solid, armor-clad origin.

items.name: Confessor
items.description: A church spy adept at covert operations. Equally adept with a sword as they are with incantations

items.name: Wretch
items.description: A poor purposeless osd naked as they day they were born. A nice club is all they have

items.name: Prophet
items.description: A seer ostracized for inauspicious prophecies. Well versed in healing incantations

items.name: Samurai
items.description: A capable fighter from the distant land of reeds. Handy with Katana and Longbows

items.name: Crimson Crystal Tear
items.description: Restores half of total HP

items.name: Crimsonspill Crystal Tear
items.description: Temporarily boosts max HP

items.name: Crimsonburst Crystal Tear
items.description: Steadily restores HP over time

items.name: Cerulean Crystal Tear
items.description: Restores half of total FP

items.name: Greenspill Crystal Tear
items.description: Temporarily boosts max Stamina

items.name: Greenburst Crystal Tear
items.description: Temporarily boosts Stamina recovery speed

items.name: Strength-Knot Crystal Tear
items.description: Temporarily boosts Strength

items.name: Dexterity-Knot Crystal Tear
items.description: Temporarily boosts Dexterity

items.name: Intelligence-Knot Crystal Tear
items.description: Temporarily boosts Intelligence

items.name: Faith-Knot Crystal Tear
items.description: Temporarily boosts Faith

items.name: Opaltine Hardtear
items.description: Temporarily boosts all damage negations

items.name: Speckled Hardtear
items.description: Temporarily boosts resistance and heals status

items.name: Leaden Hardtear
items.description: Temporarily boosts Poise

items.name: Magic-Shrouding Cracked Tear
items.description: Temporarily boosts Magic Damage

items.name: Flame-Shrouding Cracked Tear
items.description: Temporarily boosts Fire Damage

items.name: Lightning-Shrouding Cracked Tear
items.description: Temporarily boosts Lightning Damage

items.name: Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear
items.description: Temporarily boosts Holy Damage

items.name: Stonebarb Cracked Tear
items.description: Makes attacks more likely to break enemy stances

items.name: Spiked Cracked Tear
items.description: Enhances charged attacks for a time

items.name: Thorny Cracked Tear
items.description: Makes consecutive attacks grow stronger

items.name: Twiggy Cracked Tear
items.description: Briefly stops rune loss on death

items.name: Winged Crystal Tear
items.description: Temporarily reduced Equip Load

items.name: Windy Crystal Tear
items.description: Enhances dodge rolls for a time

items.name: Crimson Bubbletear
items.description: Restores HP when near death

items.name: Crimsonwhorl Bubbletear
items.description: Converts damage received into HP

items.name: Opaltine Bubbletear
items.description: Significantly negates next instance of damage

items.name: Cerulean Hidden Tear
items.description: Eliminates all FP consumption

items.name: Purifying Crystal Tear
items.description: Purifies the Lord of Blood's curse

items.name: Ruptured Crystal Tear
items.description: Causes concoction to explode

items.name: Ancient Dragons' Lightning Strike
items.description: A secret incantation of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
items.effects: Summons red lightning that spreads from impact

items.name: Aspects Of The Crucible: Horns
items.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
items.effects: creates shoulder horn to gore foes from a low stance.

items.name: Agheel's Flame
items.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power of the flying dragon Agheel.
items.effects: Spews flame breath of Agheel from above

items.name: Aspects Of The Crucible: Tail
items.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
items.effects: Creates supple tail to sweep area before caster

items.name: Barrier Of Gold
items.description: One of the incantations of Erdtree Worship.
items.effects: Greatly increases magic damage negation for self & allies

items.name: Ancient Dragons' Lightning Spear
items.description: A secret incantation of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
items.effects: Stabs with red lightning spear from above

items.name: Beast Claw
items.description: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
items.effects: Creates claws that tear through the land.

items.name: Aspect Of The Crucible: Breath
items.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
items.effects: Creates throat pouch to spew fire while walking

items.name: Bestial Constitution
items.description: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
items.effects: Alleviates blood loss and frost buildup

items.name: Bestial Sling
items.description: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman. Swiftly flings a number of sharp rock shards. This incantation can be cast without delay after performing another action. It is said that in the time before the Erdtree, stones were the first weapons of the beasts who had gained intelligence.
items.effects: Swiftly flings numerous sharp rock shards

items.name: Black Blade
items.description: Power gleaned from the remembrance of Maliketh.
items.effects: Black blade spinning slash that emits wave of light.

items.name: Black Flame Ritual
items.description: Superior black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.
items.effects: Summons circle of black flame pillars around caster.

items.name: Black Flame
items.description: A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.
items.effects: Throws a ball of raging black fire

items.name: Black Flame Blade
items.description: A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.
items.effects: Enchants right-hand armament with black flame

items.name: Bestial Vitality
items.description: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
items.effects: Heals HP over a period of time

items.name: Black Flame's Protection
items.description: A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.
items.effects: Increases phyiscal damage negation

items.name: Blessing's Boon
items.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
items.effects: Grants blessing to self and nearby allies

items.name: Blessing Of The Erdtree
items.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations
items.effects: Grants greater blessing to self and nearby allies

items.name: Bloodflame Blade
items.description: A Blood Oath incantation, granted by the Lord of Blood. Engulfs armament held in the right hand with bloodflame. This incantation can be cast while in motion. After dealing damage, bloodflame continues to build up onset of blood loss for a very short time.
items.effects: Enchants right-hand armament with bloodflame

items.name: Bloodflame Talons
items.description: A Blood Oath incantation, granted by the Lord of Blood.
items.effects: Creates bloodflame lacerations that then explode

items.name: Bloodboon
items.description: Sacred incantation of Mohg, Lord of Blood.
items.effects: Scatters bloodflame before caster to set area aflame.

items.name: Borealis's Mist
items.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion.
items.effects: Spews icy breath of Borealis from above

items.name: Cure Poison
items.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
items.effects: Cures Poison ailment and reduces poison build-up.

items.name: Burn O Flame!
items.description: One of the incantations that draws directly from the power of the
items.effects: Raises a series of flame pillars around caster

items.name: Darkness
items.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' servants, who once served as the
items.effects: Creates area of darkness that conceals caster

items.name: Death Lightning
items.description: Incantation that channels the power of the ancient dragon
items.effects: Strikes surroundings with storm of death lightning

items.name: Discus Of Light
items.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
items.effects: Fires ring of light before the caster

items.name: Divine Fortification
items.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
items.effects: Increases holy damage negation.

items.name: Dragonbolt Blessing
items.description: Superior incantation of the capital's ancient dragon cult. Summons lightning to bolster the caster's body. Attacks become easier to deflect and resistance to all ailments is increased. However, lightning damage negation will be reduced. Only those loved by dragons can survive the ordeal of cladding their bodies in lightning.
items.effects: Bolsters caster's body with lightning

items.name: Dragonice
items.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
items.effects: Channels dragon to spew icy breath

items.name: Dragonclaw
items.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
items.effects: Channels dragon to rend foes with dragon claws

items.name: Dragonfire
items.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
items.effects: Channels dragon to spew flame breath

items.name: Dragonmaw
items.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
items.effects: Channels dragon to bite foes before caster

items.name: Ekzyke's Decay
items.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power of Ekzykes, the Decaying.
items.effects: Spews scarlet rot breath of Ekzykes from above.

items.name: Ekzykes's Decay
items.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power of Ekzykes, the Decaying.
items.effects: Spews scarlet rot breath of Ekzykes from above

items.name: Fire's Deadly Sin
items.description: Incantation originating from a deeply ominous prophecy.
items.effects: Sets area and self ablaze with raging flames

items.name: Erdtree Heal
items.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
items.effects: Vastly heals HP for self and nearby allies

items.name: Flame, Fall Upon Them
items.description: One of the incantations that draws directly from the power of the
items.effects: Hurls several balls of fire at once

items.name: Ezykes's Decay
items.description: Spews scarlet rot breath of Ekzykes from above

items.name: Electrify Armament
items.description: One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
items.effects: Enchants right-hand armament with lightning damage

items.name: Flame Fortification
items.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
items.effects: Increases fire damage negation.

items.name: Flame Of The Fell God
items.description: This legendary incantation is one of several that draws directly from the power of the Fire Giants. Releases a ball of raging fire said to be inhabited by a fell god. The fireball floats toward enemies and explodes, setting the area ablaze. Arghanthy, the chief guardian of the Flame, had kept this incantation a well-kept secret until it was stolen by Adan. The fell god still lurks within the Fire Giants.
items.effects: Summons raging fireball that explodes and sets the area ablaze

items.name: Elden Stars
items.description: This legendary incantation is the most ancient of those that derive from the Erdtree.
items.effects: Creates a steam of golden shooting stars that assail the area.

items.name: Flame, Protect Me
items.description: The most ancient of the Fire Monks' incantations.
items.effects: Greatly increases fire damage negation

items.name: Fortissax's Lightning Spear
items.description: Incantation that channels the power of the ancient dragon Fortissax.
items.effects: Stabs from above with two red lightning spears in tandem

items.name: Frozen Lightning Spear
items.description: Incantation that channels the power of the Dragonkin Soldiers. Creates a spear of ice lightning and stabs it into the ground from above. On impact, the spear will burst into trails of lightning advancing forwards. The Dragonkin were born in the Eternal City, where they knew no true sky, nor true lightning. Instead, ice lightning was their weapon.
items.effects: Stabs with ice lightning spear from above

items.name: Glintstone Breath
items.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
items.effects: Channels dragon to spew icy breath.

items.name: Golden Lightning Fortification
items.description: An incantation of Erdtree Worship.
items.effects: Greatly increases lightning resistance for self and allies

items.name: Frenzied Burst
items.description: Incantations originating from the maddening Three Fingers.
items.effects: Emits concentrated blast of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes

items.name: Giantsflame Take Thee
items.description: One of the incantations that draws directly from the power of the
items.effects: Hurls massive ball of raging fire

items.name: Golden Vow (spell)
items.description: An incantation of Erdtree Worship.
items.effects: Increases attack and defense for self and allies

items.name: Gurrang's Beast Claw
items.description: Superior incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
items.effects: Creates beast claws to rend surroundings with shockwaves

items.name: Immutable Shield
items.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
items.effects: Increases left-hand shield's affinity/ailment resistance

items.name: Heal
items.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
items.effects: Heals HP for you and nearby allies.

items.name: Howl Of Shabriri
items.description: Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.
items.effects: Shrieks, building up madness in nearby foes

items.name: Great Heal
items.description: Superior incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
items.effects: Greatly Heals HP for self and nearby allies

items.name: Greyoll's Roar
items.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power of Greyoll, the Elder Dragon. An incantation of legendary status.
items.effects: Emits the roar of Elder Dragon Greyoll.

items.name: Inescapable Frenzy
items.description: Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.
items.effects: Latches onto foes to spread madness

items.name: Honed Bolt
items.description: One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
items.effects: Strikes foe with lightning bolt from above

items.name: Lansseax's Glaive
items.description: Incantation that channels the powr of the ancient dragon Lansseax.
items.effects: Sweeps from above with red lightning glaive.

items.name: Lightning Fortification
items.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
items.effects: Increass lighting damage negation

items.name: Lord's Aid
items.description: Incantation bestowed by the Two Fingers upon the Tarnished
items.effects: Alleviates poison / blood loss / sleep buildup for self / allies

items.name: Lightning Spear
items.description: One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult. Summons a lightning spear and hurls it before the caster. Charging causes a lightning bolt to strike the point ofimpact. Long ago, Godwyn the Golden defeated the ancient dragon Fortissax, and befriended his fallen foe — an event that gave rise to the ancient dragon cult in the capital.
items.effects: Hurls lightning spear before caster

items.name: Law Of Causality
items.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
items.effects: Retaliates upon receiving a number of blows

items.name: Litany Of Proper Death
items.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
items.effects: Creates image of Order to deal holy damage

items.name: Law Of Regression
items.description: Incantation of the Golden Order fundamentalists. One of the key fundamentals. Heals all negative statuses, dispels special effects, and reveals mimicry in all its forms. The fundamentalists describe the Golden Order through the powers of regression and causality. Regression is the pull of meaning; that all things yearn eternally to converge.
items.effects: Heals all ailments and dispels all special effects

items.name: Lightning Strike
items.description: One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
items.effects: Summons lightning bolt that spreads from impact.

items.name: Lord's Divine Fortification
items.description: Incantation taught to Gideon the All-Knowing by the Two
items.effects: Greatly increases holy damage negation incl. allies

items.name: Lord's Heal
items.description: Incantation bestowed by the Two Fingers upon the Tarnished
items.effects: Massively heals HP for self and nearby allies

items.name: Order Healing
items.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
items.effects: Alleviates death blight buildup

items.name: Noble Presence
items.description: Ancient power of the Godskin Nobles.
items.effects: Thrust out belly with gusto to unelash repelling shockwave

items.name: Order's Blade
items.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists. Used by hunters of Those Who Live in Death. Enchants armament held in the right hand with holy-affinity attacks. This incantation is especially damaging to Those Who Live in Death. Any felled by this incantation cannot be revived. The role of the hunters is to stamp out defiled reason - all for the perfection of the Golden Order.
items.effects: Enchanted right-hand armament with holy damage

items.name: Magic Fortification
items.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful. Increases magic damage negation. This incantation can be cast while in motion. Follow the path that has been set for you, and you will make enemies of all others: the monks, the sorcerers, the ancient dragon knights, and the scions of gold. Heed me – the Lands Between offers no welcome to the Tarnished.
items.effects: Increases magic damage negation

items.name: O, Flame!
items.description: Incantation of the Fire Monks.
items.effects: Momentarily sparks roaring flame from hand

items.name: Magma Breath
items.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
items.effects: Channels wyrm to spew magma breath

items.name: Pest Threads
items.description: Incantation of the servants of rot.
items.effects: Launches countless sticky threads before caster

items.name: Protection Of The Erdtree
items.description: A superior incantation of Erdtree Worship. Increase damage negation for all affinities except physical, for both the caster and nearby allies. Hold to continue praying and delay activation. In the beginning, everything was in opposition to the Erdtree. But through countless victories in war, it became the embodiment of Order.
items.effects: Increases affinity damage negation for self & allies

items.name: Poison Armament
items.description: Incantation of the servants of rot. Enchants armament held in the right hand with poison. This incantation can be cast while in motion. Those who dwell within poison know rot all too well. The death that begets life, that comes to all equally. That is to say: it is the cycle of rebirth put into practice.

items.name: Placidusax's Ruin
items.description: Power gleaned form the remembrance of Dragonlord Placidusax.
items.effects: Spews golden breath of Dragonlord Placidusax

items.name: Poison Mist
items.description: Incantation of the servants of rot.
items.effects: Releases poison mist before caster.

items.name: Radagon's Rings Of Light
items.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
items.effects: Creates golden ring of light to attack wide area

items.name: Rotten Breath
items.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
items.effects: Channels dragon to spew scarlet rot breath

items.name: Rejection
items.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
items.effects: Produces a shockwave that pushes away foes.

items.name: Smarag's Glintstone Breath
items.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion.
items.effects: Spews magic breath of Glintstone Dragon Smarag from above

items.name: Stone Of Gurranq
items.description: Superior incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
items.effects: Hurls a boulder before the caster

items.name: Surge, O Flame!
